name: Duck Factory <3
description:
This is in suuuuuuuper early development. I can't call it a "game" yet.. more like an idea presentation? I guess.. I'll keep actively working on it, to make it more playable. Thank you for the patience. I uploaded this, so I just barely can make it on deadline for local BRSD contest (or in english Stop Talking Start Doing). https://www.gamedev.lv/lv/article/tiek_izsludinats_konkurss_brsd_9

A sequel to Duck Factory 2: https://jdzsk.itch.io/

Currently i reused the sorting mechanism from DF2, but I'll make some small adjustemnts to it.
